short_summary: Reissue of solicitation of offers for DART-MS Ion Sources
description: Health Canada has a requirement for two Direct Analysis in Real Time Mass Spectrometry (DART-MS) Ion Sources to be supplied, delivered, installed, and training provided at the Vancouver Drug Analysis Service (DAS) Laboratory in Burnaby, British Columbia with an option for up to two additional unit by March 31, 2026.
full_summary:
# Government of Canada Solicitation - Installation of Direct Analysis in Real Time Mass Spectrometry (DART-MS) Ion Sources

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4310926999
* **Publication Date**: May 2, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 23, 2024, 14:00:00 EST
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Amendment Date**: May 2, 2024

## Supply Details

* **Supply Description**: Direct Analysis in Real Time Mass Spectrometry (DART-MS) Ion Sources
* **Quantity**: Two units
* **Option**: Up to two additional units
* **Revision Date**: March 31, 2026
* **Delivery Location**: Vancouver Drug Analysis Service (DAS) Laboratory, Burnaby, British Columbia

## Requirements

* **Installation**: The contractor will be required to provide, deliver, install, and complete the necessary training for the DART-MS Ion Sources.

## Supporting Documents

* **Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

## Important Information

* Please refer to the solicitation document for the complete tender requirements.
* This solicitation of offers cancels and supersedes previous solicitation of offers number H4005-235061-Doc4404059731 dated March 11, 2024 with a closing of April 23, 2024.
* A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offerors who offered on the previous solicitation.

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Agency**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Kenny Seeto (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: kenny.seeto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: None
* **Fax**: None
